attributes.action: GIVE OUR KIDS A FUTURE IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details: now could be the time to let the goverment know that enuf is enuf .our taxes are being wasted on police .goverment .council spending etc etc .yet not much spending on trying to create jobs and a future for our next generation of children .face it if they were at work they wudnt be rioting in the streets complaining about exesive tuition fees .and all the cuts surrounding there chance to build a future for themselves ..but this goverment wants to crush the youth today. the banks aint lending to small buisnesses  as they promised .so jobs and stability cant be restored to the public .but they will spend a fortune on policing and suppressing the youths and there voice rather than establish a future for the uk public
